text: Trailer Tuesday takes grandma for a walk, does an uncomfortable amount of clicking, and wanders around on stilts this week. Menace from the Deep “Menace from the Deep is an enthralling Roguelike Deckbuilding card game that unfolds in a dark world, drawing inspiration from Howard Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos.” Menace from the Deep is available now on Steam. CLICKOLDING “The man in the corner of your hotel room wants you to click something. He wants to watch you click it.” CLICKOLDING is available now on Steam. Castaway “Retrieve your weapons, face bosses to save your dog in a retro adventure focused on 3 dungeons.” Castaway is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam. Kvark “Kvark is an FPS game set in a fictional version of the 80s Czech Republic. The player finds themselves in an underground facility that is falling apart as they travel through it.” Kvark is available now on Steam. Stilt Fella “Become the fella. Walk on the stilts.” Stilt Fella is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam. A Walk With Yiayia “A Walk with Yiayia is a heartfelt solo-developed, bite-sized adventure game about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she’s lost her confidence from a scary fall.” A Walk With Yiayia is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam. Project Planet – Earth vs Humanity “Destroy Humanity with virus outbreaks, asteroid impacts and more as Planet Earth!” Project Planet – Earth vs Humanity is available now on Steam. Tlatoani: Aztec Cities “Give rise to wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder. From humble beginnings build, trade, manage and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).” Tlatoani: Aztec Cities is available now on Steam Early Access. Beyond The Darkness “You will find yourself in bizarre worlds of memories, distorted by fears, and your only weapon will be the light of a small lamp…” Beyond The Darkness is available now on Steam. Bloodless “Stylish, action-adventure game featuring counter-based, non-lethal combat centered around ronin Tomoe’s signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.” Bloodless is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
html:
Trailer Tuesday takes grandma for a walk, does an uncomfortable amount of clicking, and wanders around on stilts this week.

Menace from the Deep

“Menace from the Deep is an enthralling Roguelike Deckbuilding card game that unfolds in a dark world, drawing inspiration from Howard Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos.”

Menace from the Deep is available now on Steam.

CLICKOLDING

“The man in the corner of your hotel room wants you to click something. He wants to watch you click it.”

CLICKOLDING is available now on Steam.

Castaway

“Retrieve your weapons, face bosses to save your dog in a retro adventure focused on 3 dungeons.”

Castaway is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

Kvark

“Kvark is an FPS game set in a fictional version of the 80s Czech Republic. The player finds themselves in an underground facility that is falling apart as they travel through it.”

Kvark is available now on Steam.

Stilt Fella

“Become the fella. Walk on the stilts.”

Stilt Fella is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Microsoft Store, and Steam.

A Walk With Yiayia

“A Walk with Yiayia is a heartfelt solo-developed, bite-sized adventure game about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she’s lost her confidence from a scary fall.”

A Walk With Yiayia is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam.

Project Planet – Earth vs Humanity

“Destroy Humanity with virus outbreaks, asteroid impacts and more as Planet Earth!”

Project Planet – Earth vs Humanity is available now on Steam.

Tlatoani: Aztec Cities

“Give rise to wonders of the Aztec Civilization as you build your own magnificent metropolis in this ancient city builder. From humble beginnings build, trade, manage and conquer to become Tlatoani (Emperor).”

Tlatoani: Aztec Cities is available now on Steam Early Access.

Beyond The Darkness

“You will find yourself in bizarre worlds of memories, distorted by fears, and your only weapon will be the light of a small lamp…”

Beyond The Darkness is available now on Steam.

Bloodless

“Stylish, action-adventure game featuring counter-based, non-lethal combat centered around ronin Tomoe’s signature dash-counter mechanic, fighting with nothing but her bare fists to disarm her former allies, the samurai army of Shogun Akechi.”

Bloodless is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
